title: Apple breakfast muffins
ingredients: ['2 large eggs', '100ml vegetable oil', '120g white or golden caster sugar', '150ml whole milk or soya milk', '300g self raising flour', '3 teaspoons baking powder', '3 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '1 generous teaspoons vanilla extract', '1 pinch salt', '100g rolled oats', '3 apples, grated (I use Braeburn)', 'demerara sugar for sprinkling']
